articles.title: Sony announces FE 50mm f2.5 G, FE 40mm f2.5 G, FE 24mm f2.8 G lens, specifications, price, availability confirmed - Camera Jabber
articles.description: Sony has announced three new full-frame lenses, the FE 50mm F2.5 G, FE 40mm F2.5 G and FE 24mm F2.8 G for its mirrorless cameras
articles.content: Sony has announced three new full-frame lenses, the FE 50mm F2.5 G (model SEL50F25G), FE 40mm F2.5 G (model SEL40F25G) and FE 24mm F2.8 G (model SEL24F28G). Naturally, they are all said to deliver hi… [+3897 chars]
